identity.name: Maizul
design_principles: Fusion: Traditional Mexican warmth + Modern Coastal Minimalism
Content: Storytelling through food and ocean imagery
Contrast: Deep Blue vs. Sunny Yellow vs. White Sand

typography.instructions: Use 'Fraunces' for all Headings (H1-H4). Use 'Inter' for body text, UI elements, and navigation. Ensure 'Fraunces' is used with 'font-variation-settings' for weight/optical sizing if available, or standard weights 600-900.

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid blocks or subtle noise textures.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background if possible to mimic sand/paper.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FFEC76] text-[#3B56B0] hover:bg-[#FDE047] rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-semibold shadow-sm transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#3B56B0] text-[#3B56B0] hover:bg-[#3B56B0] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-medium transition-colors

components.cards: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 p-6
components.inputs: rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3B56B0] focus:border-transparent
components.navigation: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 glassmorphism transition-all duration-300

layout_strategies.general: Mobile-first. Stacking columns on mobile, 12-col grid on desktop.
layout_strategies.hero: Full-height (min-h-[80vh]) with video background or high-impact image. Centered text or asymmetric split.
layout_strategies.bento_grid: Use for the 'Popular Dishes' or 'Instagram Feed' section. Mix 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 items.
layout_strategies.spacing: Use 'py-20' or 'py-24' for section vertical padding. 'gap-8' or 'gap-12' for grids.

motion.hover_effects: Scale up slightly (1.02) or shift up (-4px) on cards.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Fraunces' via Google Fonts (import in index.css).
Implement the 'Glassmorphism' header with a blur effect.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the 'Why Maizul' or 'Gallery' section.
Ensure the 'WhatsApp' CTA is sticky on mobile bottom-right.
For the Admin Dashboard, use a clean, dense layout (Mode B) with the Maizul Blue branding.
Implement language toggler (ES/EN) in the navbar.
Use the specific images provided in the 'images' object for their respective sections.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle patterns.
Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards.
